title: Koundi Et Le Jeudi National (2011)
description:
Koundi, a village of some 1200 inhabitants, is situated in Cameroon's East Province, and is rich in timber - the source of almost everyone's income. The villagers, who have organised themselves as a communal organisation, obtain the right to run a small forestry operation. But they wisely realise that the forest isn't a permanent source of income and begin the process of creating something more sustainable - a cacao plantation.
